details.sectionContent: This event will give you the knowledge of creating your own PCB design
It the basic technical, knowledgeable or funny event in which participants will learn about basic software and will be performed something interesting. (take away circuit)

In this round, participants will have to identify the symbols, which are going to be displayed. If they identify the symbol correctly, then they have to give its 2 applications. Points are allotted, on the basis of their answer.

In this participants will be provided a hint or a duo which will lead them to another clue i.e. where the next hint/clue is located. The last clue will give them surprise box which will be used for 3rd round. Participants who are able to get to reach up to 3 or 4th step of treasure hunt would be able to 3rd round.

In this round all participants will be learn about PCB wizard software and how to perform a circuit in it. Then they will be designed that circuit on a PCB board on their own. This is very interesting and surprised amazing round.
